Dialogue.Text: Hey Phil! I'm going to try to help you win Dianna's heart. First, you'll need to collect some elemental flowers. Try to find one.. ps. top right corner may help!
Great! See what happened there, you filled one of your vases, displayed at the top left corner. Do it again so you see what I mean.
Now, you should watch out for these obstacles. They'll cause you to drop a vase and/or flower. Touch one to see.
Oh, looks like you have some competition. Dont let them touch you or they may steal your vases and/or flowers. Touch one to see.
That's all for now. But I'll be around to help more. Back button on bottom left what you're done. May have to touch something else.
